website_summaries.verdict: A versatile, low-cost system that does not require Internet access to work but can also be set up for remote view on your smartphone.
pros: Includes a live-view option on your smartphone
Simple setup on a good quality set of bullet cameras
Cost is half of some others offering similar features
Good customer service from the company
cons: This system can be purchased with an included hard drive, but it it will cost you more

customer_reviews.title: Remote vewing app does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like coukd be good system. Pointless without an app to remote view cams. App to use with this system does not work. No help and dealing witj people with badly broken english. Seems like they use google translate to respond to help. Run away from this product!
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Hippie

customer_reviews.title: High failure rate, delayed customer support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this system 10 months ago and paid licensed professionals to run all the cabling throughout our home and setup the DVR. It was difficult to get customer support, when we could not get the DVR to recognize our network, after multiple attempts we received a hyperlink to the online manual that we already had...no help at all. The cameras began to malfunction 1 month ago, and now 8 of the 16 just stopped working. I tried restarting, reconnecting the entire system with no success. I I would advise looking at some other system for your security camera needs.
customer_reviews.author: luis valencia

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely NO customer support!
customer_reviews.text: I have been calling 1 (860) 850-2826 and 1 (860) 850-2826 for the last week. I get "nobody is available to take your call" Amazon has tried calling ZOSI. They get nothing, either. They may have a great product but support is a big zero. AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE! Maybe this will get Zosi's attention!
customer_reviews.author: William J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Camera replacement
customer_reviews.text: Bought this system 3 months ago. One of the cameras didn't work. It displayed black/white instead of color. Contact customer service and they were very helpful to diagnose the problem. They will be send a replacement camera due to the 1 year warranty. Monitor for these 16 cameras works best on 32 inch TV. The DVR unit generates a lot of heat. My recommendation is to get an external fan (laptop fan) and place it under the unit to cut down the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Still setting up
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have not been able to get the mobile app to work due to router information that I dont have. The picture is ok, seems to have more "noise" than other cameras I have used but I am hoping I can tweak some settings and fix that. I will update the review once they are all up and mobile app is working.
customer_reviews.author: Jkwalk

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Looks better on monitor pictures are taken from phone ..After a lot of replaced stuff finally got it all straight..company was great replaced a camera fast.. First off if u have rainbow line running through monitor it's most likely a wire..if camera goes black when night vision comes on with video loss witch can shut down hard drive freezing DVR if camera can't straighten it self up most likely is a bad camera test on different wire if still going black with video loss it's bad camera..test by shinning light on camera at night...also good night vision...
customer_reviews.author: Dennis long

customer_reviews.title: What was amazing was the clarity of the pictures- incredible
customer_reviews.text: I hired a security expert to install the hard drive and put up the cameras....but after watching it done, I am sure anyone could do it. Very simple. What was amazing was the clarity of the pictures- incredible, especially for the price! The installer said it was one of the best pictures he has seen, and he has been installing systems since they first came out. He gave it a 5 star rating, and I agree. I used a good monitor for it, so that is another investment...but at the price and quality of this system you can afford a nice monitor. HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I can say for the money the system is good , however the cameras are fragile and break easy. The connections if ever left uncovered quick corrasion and camera will die. The screws rust very fast " did I say cheap" Absolutely I don't recommend for outdoors. I have gone through 3 camera replacements from a 16 camera system . I got this system for a good price not worth over $300 I feel soon DIY installs will go away as you need some tech knowledge to set up with PC and mobile apps and port forwarding can be a struggle . Overall it is a good starter unit !
customer_reviews.author: Mimositas

customer_reviews.title: Works for me !
customer_reviews.text: The product is as as advertised. I installed the equipment and had no issues except for a password matter which was corrected by the tech by email. The instructions need more detail and larger readable print. The support could be faster. I had no issues with defective equipment and was impresses by the camera picture quality and night vision. You need to get the cameras aimed properly to get the IR's on the subject and prevent reflection. This product for the home is worth the price. If you want professional equipment then you must pay the price! I will write another report after a year to see how the equipment holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Power Supplies for Cameras
customer_reviews.text: I ordered: ZOSI 1080p 16 Channel Video Surveillance System,16 Channel DVR 4TB (Hard Drive) 1080p Hybrid Recorder and 16 Outdoor/Indoor CCTV Bullet Camera 1080p No power supplies were in box for the 16 cameras. Cameras will NOT work without power supplies. No where in ad did it state power supplies not included for this full system. 16 Cameras and Cables (all cables had ends to plug into power supplies). Either provide the 16 camera power supplies or refund my money. Note, I tried calling company's displayed phone number several times during regular business hours and it was NOT working.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: This system and company SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A TERRIBLE SYSTEM! Do NOT purchase it! Electricians did the install at my business, we are intelligent and tech savvy, but both the app and setup of the software function are A DISASTER! If you want to spend 4+ hours to get yours running, disregard this review and take this piece of junk home with you.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Company is great
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install and we ordered several cameras extra to add to this system that worked as well. When we first got the cameras, we noticed 2/8 had something like fibers under the lenses that made them less useful as cameras. Contacted the company and they immediately sent replacements and a label to return the bad ones. They were very quick and responsive and it was great. The app itself is a little finicky so be aware of that. Also the DVR resets it's address every time it resets so if you have your wifi on permissions only, you'll have to constantly re-add this one to be permitted.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer service, Cameras work well for the budget
customer_reviews.text: Works as described for a budget security camera set. Peace of mind with great customer service. Slina was always responsive and very kind. Had issues with 2 of the cables and they replaced it right away, no questions asked. Cameras have good image quality. The only low point is the dvr console software. Its vey antiquate and clunky to work (passwords cant be reset on the system, they need to be remotely reset. not very safe!). Other than that, excellent buy and very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Coutinho Rudge Barbosa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing system! Easy to use, easy to set up, great quality, exactly as described! The app situation can be kind of confusing.. get ahold of the techs through Facebook, I did and they made it a snap.. don't be afraid to ask for help!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caution!!  Post sale support is non-existent.  Unit failed after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, a decent system when it works.......WHEN it works. This purchase sat in a box for months until a construction project completed. The cameras were installed in January 2020. In March 2020, the DVR malfunctioned and would not boot past the startup screen. I contacted the manufacturer and entered a ticket. I received two responses from them, the second being a file to re-flash the DVR, to no avail. I have been unable to get a response from them since. An item such as this useless if you are unable to get service. I would caution you in ordering this brand due to lack of support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had ZOSI cameras hooked up to my old system and loved the cameras. So now I purchased this entire kit and was very happy!! Very easy to setup, contrary to what others have said. I installed the hard drive into the Dvr and then followed the directions. I also downloaded the app and it all works great, especially for the cost. I highly recommend the system!!! Cameras are so clear in the daytime and very good at night.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Have issues that tech support have not addressed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this DVR and camera package to replace an identical one taken out by lightning. Came loaded with a different software that some features do not work. Opened a ticket with support and am still waiting for resolution. Time will tell if I have to return it through Amazon's customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Metzker

customer_reviews.title: RUN AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Night vision on this product is terrible. Only the center of the camera is night vision almost like a spotlight shining in the middle of the picture. Cameras are hard to adjust and cheaply made. I stripped on set screw with very little pressure. Also getting the lock nut to fasten on the camera mount is a joke. This is the third camera system I’ve set up and by far it’s the worst quality. App doesn’t work at all. Run Run Run away from this product. My money is already wasted but I will be replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: It's an okay system
customer_reviews.text: Originally, one out of four cameras worked. After checking for interference with wiring, we got a second one to work. The third camera miraculously started working after three days. Four days after receiving the cameras, we opened the last broken one to find that a connector was not connected inside the camera. We fixed the last camera by making the connection. The screws provided stripped out easily, so we had to get bigger screws. I agree with another customer that the DVR is loud, and play back slow. We also broke a cable trying to get it through the hole to the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Maia Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best 1080p cameras I ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up amazing pictures quality 1080p at it's best. Whoever wrote bad reviews on this product , you must be out your mind. These are amazing! It took me about 3 hours to get install them around my home but afterwards it was time to celebrate! This product is well packaged and it came as advertised that k you seller and thank you Amazon prime ones again.
customer_reviews.author: Jose ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance replacing my old lower resolution system with this Zosi system. Very satisfied. Te remote view app works well and the video quality is so much better than my old system from... Now I can't remember it's name...
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Unit stop working 2 years later!
customer_reviews.text: I would never buy from this company again after trying to get my unit up and running after it starting failing I was told that because the warranty expired just days before they couldn't and wouldn't do anything for me basically! So I found another company with better product and lets not even talk about all the friends that i got to buy from Zosi... You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Aerick

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value, good quality cameras. Has good visibility, day or night. Easy install. I preferred this system over the wireless because I would not have to worry about loosing connection. Also has an app with easy connection and playback. My only ‘issue’ is the app needs some work, sometimes it looses connection but overall I can’t complain. Good product, good price. Customer support is fairly quick as well, the woman I spoke to, Doris, was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Frank and Tati 🥰

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping. Awesome quality. Perfect cameras
customer_reviews.text: Man these cameras are bad ass! In color, night vision, alerts,live view and audio. And the picture is so clear its amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Wikkid Angel

customer_reviews.title: App does not work most of the time
customer_reviews.text: Cameras are good but dvr and connection to the app does not work most of the time. There are not many options with same price. I will recommend buying a different DVR. The cameras are ok.
customer_reviews.author: javier

customer_reviews.title: Nice security system!
customer_reviews.text: The system is well made, cameras have good wather protection, image quality is great, some difficulties in configuration but everything works!
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Gómez

customer_reviews.title: Ok camera system.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot for the life of me get it ti stay connected to the moblie app. It keeps crashing and reseting dvr. Some of the infared lights on one camera went out so my night vision isnt so great on it. Playback is really finicky too.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the old DVR. For now I just use it with the old cameras and it worked great. I will replace some of the old cameras next. Setup was a breeze and both the display software and the phone app worked wonderfully. The software is simple and non-sophisticated but plenty for my needs. It's a steal considering the value you are getting for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Small Business User

customer_reviews.title: Can't see anything without Cameras
customer_reviews.text: I got scammed. I didn't get any cameras. Wax supposed to get 16 cameras and got ZERO only got the receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: night vision and quality
customer_reviews.text: was purchase about a month and just install last few days, picture quality is good for the money and the night vision very disappointed me, and one of the camera lens crack. if anyone need better night vision then have to get better system.
customer_reviews.author: NoLaWelder

customer_reviews.title: Horrible camera
customer_reviews.text: They have a very low quality of the videos, also they only record partially, every time i try to see a video, i would say half of the time it shows NO DATA, called 2 professional installers for them and they said the quality of this product is horrible, i wish i had look a little more before buying, also the customer service DOES NOT ANSWER YOU AT ALL
customer_reviews.author: Jamil Elias Swaid

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tech support
customer_reviews.text: I’m very satisfied with tech support especially Emma. She’s very knowledgeable,helpful. she did an awesome job with my DVR problem. 5 stars for you Emma.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: A  bought it because I want to see it on my phone
customer_reviews.text: I can see the video on my phone Ib I bought three of them And I want to return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There should be more detailed instructions in ENGLISH. It ...
customer_reviews.text: There should be more detailed instructions in ENGLISH. It says absolutely nothing about the recording, type of chip to use or what is the max you can use.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Poor picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall poor quality. Cannot get phone app to work at all. Pictures at night in living room cannot even make out who's sitting on the couch. Will try more tomorrow at this point not happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: We where Let down when it truly mattered!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one system, it had a hard drive issue. The system was traded out at no cost. Low and behold the second system has a hard drive issue. I know this because I had a situation where I needed it and the she said no data was available before the current day. This system apparently can’t be counted on. Ever!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Heath

customer_reviews.title: Overall okay product
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install these cameras because I had previous cameras just had to replace them because of age. It like the day view of these cameras, BUT the night vision I wouldn't say is the greatest. They easily reflect on objects and it's hard to see from them at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at a low cost!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent "In a box" solution at a great price! The camera/picture quality is excellent! Easy to setup and configure. I love the Mobile app and how user friendly it is! Their support is very good and they stand behind their product. I highly recommend Zosi Surveillance Systems!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ponticello

customer_reviews.title: Parts in operating conditions/warranty on parts
customer_reviews.text: 2 of total 6 x 60' cables are not working at all, no reception of the videos on the screen. Thus my 2 cameras of no use at all. I am not satisfied at all unless Zusi ship me another 2x60' AV camera cables, please. If Zusi sends me cables, my opinion will change and hence the rating here too. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Vishrut

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: bought this system and found problems with night vision with 2 cameras. Slina in customer service helped me all the way until the problems were solved. Slina is professional, knowledgeable and really cares about customer satisfaction. I can trust a product with this kind of customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Zosi user

customer_reviews.title: Need better programming software  JUNK
customer_reviews.text: One camera fuzzy. Program is ok. Not user friendly. Easy install. Pray it doesn't lose power. Reboots in a loop. and it gone 3 months and no go. POS JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Clear picture even at night. Keeps up to two weeks of constant taping before taping over it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney fan

customer_reviews.title: Tech support not good
customer_reviews.text: Hello, Can some one from Zosi contact me? My dvr system device id says the code its illegal. I purchased the dvr couple months ago. I also cannot connect to the app.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Chavira

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is good
customer_reviews.text: When I first got my shipment, the DVR wasn't working at all. It would stay on the zosi logo screen then turn off and beep. I contacted customer support and they advised me to reboot the system but it didn't work. The representative Coco helped us out and I had a new one shipped to me. They were extremely helpful throughout the process.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Five star customer service
customer_reviews.text: Tech support makes it worth it. Speedy service through FB messenger. I bought this for my new house and it is perfect. I put all the cameras outside and they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This security System sucks night vision claims to work up to 100 feet but we have no back lights it won’t work more than 10 feet don’t waste your money if you’re looking for a 24 hour surveillance during the day the cameras work great howeverThe online app for your phone does not work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: It is a very convenient and well-made product. I have problem contacted I Contact (Helly) really kind and special ..(thank you helly ^^) I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JONG JIN YANG

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk This dvr we trash end up freezing. I couldn't view it daytime it would freeze. And the notifications to my fb wouldn't send pics. It was clearly defective. Now the new on is the best system I could ask for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, less than stellar product
customer_reviews.text: Glitched continuously. Worked then didn’t. Was accesible externally then wasn’t. Not reliable if you want to keep an eye on your property. Can’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: teaMJPx

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Do not buy. Nothing but a headache.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a camera system less than a year ago and I have had nothing but problems. Cameras glitching all the time. Cutting out for days at a time. Really difficult to navigate through system and set anything up. Just bad overall system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a couple of months ago and received a defective unit and upon chatting to a customer service representative, a replacement unit was sent to me within a day. Although English is not their strong language, they never leave your problem unresolved if you email them. The new unit has not give me any problem and has maintained a steady quality.
customer_reviews.author: cfw12

customer_reviews.title: Not only the cameras are great, the service is great too
customer_reviews.text: Superb.. Not only the cameras are great, the service is great too... Very prompt email replies for any questions you have.
customer_reviews.author: Puneet

customer_reviews.title: This camera can only be mounted upward to a ceiling or surface no on a wall
customer_reviews.text: if you mount this on a wall the camera won't turn sideways. definitely don't buy these bullet cameras
customer_reviews.author: Bestfijikava inc

customer_reviews.title: good servant
customer_reviews.text: home security Emma was a blessing to Harry And Mary Cole If we have any question I would like to talk to Emma only she know what she is doing. We are very please with her knowledge. Emma is very smart. Thank you so very much Emma. Mary Cole
customer_reviews.author: MaryDCole

customer_reviews.title: this system can not be adjusted or control from PC
customer_reviews.text: disappointed my old system I replaced with this was controllable though software on PC this one is not. The only way to control and set it up is at the dvr with a monitor and mouse connected to it. Only can be viewed remotely can not do anything remotely only look at images customer support only e-mail no phone number to call
customer_reviews.author: George Fox

customer_reviews.title: great buy, sharp imagine
customer_reviews.text: A great system works awesome. Sharp image. It can be seen through the phone. Great video perception.
customer_reviews.author: Dariana R

customer_reviews.title: Best service straight from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: Had a issue with DVR but received a great service from the company. Replacement came fast. Great cameras and picture. Quick and best service. Definitely a good buy for the money. Thanks Amazon too.
customer_reviews.author: mihir kansagara

customer_reviews.title: Hey all you cool cats and kittens
customer_reviews.text: Stupid proof set up. Would buy again. Only dislike is the usb mouse is junk, throw a wireless mouse in your cart while buying this system, extension wires for the cameras and you’ll be set.
customer_reviews.author: Shane bair

customer_reviews.title: WOW WHAT A GREAT SYSTEM!
customer_reviews.text: A+++ Product. Very happy with my purchase. Seller was great! Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Cameras work and look great
customer_reviews.text: Product works good had an issue customer service took care of it right away
customer_reviews.author: (joe kail) joesatellite

customer_reviews.title: The ZOSI 16 system replaced our older DVR
customer_reviews.text: The system was easy to install and set up. I had a question about remote view and their support was quick and helpful. Great system and support.
customer_reviews.author: Don Yates

customer_reviews.title: Cameras decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: The video quality is decent as is the night vision, you can't really pick out license plates, but you should be able to make out people's faces if they aren't too far off in the distance. The user interface for the DVR is decent, but takes some figuring out since the instructions were obviously translated and there is a slight language barrier.
customer_reviews.author: MacGru3er

customer_reviews.title: not working
customer_reviews.text: i bought this product and installed in my home last three month but now stop recording and i email to the tech and they asking me to many question and not able to fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got to have extra security in these days n times
customer_reviews.text: Very clear picture even clear at night my other system was snowy at night,great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money and great customer service when needed. Had a small issue over the weekend and they were texting me with in a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun palyok

customer_reviews.title: One camera not working, promptly sent another one
customer_reviews.text: Initially had a tough time getting a response. However Slina helped a lot and sent me another unit for my camera. She was helpful and solved my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mita Patel

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and all works great. Compared to my other 4 year old other brand system this is far superior in quality and ease of installation and setup
customer_reviews.author: J. Westgard

customer_reviews.title: Great tech support
customer_reviews.text: I worked over the last 2 nights on a problem and tech support on messenger was very good although the time difference was tough.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Order came fast, 2 days it was at my door and it was just as described, no trickery, no BS, it is exactly what they said and described
customer_reviews.author: Bags

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: No problems to get on line and picture is great even on our phones
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: systom is nice but the app is not that good. crashes alot
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: *****Beware Do not buy****Does not work via remote app or with web browser.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for good quality and technical support profesional
customer_reviews.author: FERNANDO DUARTE

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this product and it doesnt record. i buy the harddrive and put it in still didnt work now i have to buy another DVR
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: I am really satisfied with price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are high quality and clear more than I expected them. I am happy with the price and quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nigisti

customer_reviews.title: Bad cable
customer_reviews.text: Works great just one of my cables was bad from the get go 100ft cables
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, clear video day& night wish the cable would of been a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Yajaira Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Great cameras.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Customer support via Facebook messenger is easy and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: LRH

customer_reviews.title: Recommend three weeks in
customer_reviews.text: Three weeks in and it’s great pictures and easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Boy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These Cameras are amazing quality at an unbelievable price. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Punkin

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Was Great
customer_reviews.text: Had a few glitches initially but Emma was great at helping me. Thanks to her, I will purchase this system or one similar
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Now I have a little peace  of mind
customer_reviews.text: I love how clear you can see day and night you can’t beat the price for what you get I installed it at my house
customer_reviews.author: gavriil gavriiloglou

customer_reviews.title: Facebook customer service
customer_reviews.text: Was having trouble installing. The Facebook customer service team was quick and easy with trouble shooting. I would have them 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Broken when opened
customer_reviews.text: One of the cameras arrived broken so only 3 were able to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: Awesome customer service. Did help me step by step to connect dvr and zosi app. Works great now. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Infrared not working anymore
customer_reviews.text: I have one problem. One of the camera Infrared not working anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value product, works good, received timely support from Zosi as needed. Item arrived in time.
customer_reviews.author: Nadirashvili Vasili

customer_reviews.title: thank you
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can’t beat it .. cameras are decent quality , easy to set up and run .. one of my cameras broke during set up so have to be careful not to strip bend the camera mount much .. overall I’m happy
customer_reviews.author: Chase

product_meta.title: ZOSI H.265+1080P FHD Video Security Camera System,8 Channel CCTV DVR Recorder and 4 x 2.0MP 1080p Weatherproof Surveillance Cameras Outdoor Indoor, 120ft Night Vision, Remote Access (No HDD)
product_meta.description:
Size:4Cam1080p DVR Main Features
Operating System: Embedded LINUX OS
Compression Format: H.265+
Video Input: 8 Channel
Video Output: 1CH HDMI+1CH VGA+1CH CVBS 
Audio Input: 4CH RCA
Audio Output: 1CH RCA
Display Split: 1/4/8/9
Trigger Event: Recording,PTZ,Tour,Alarm,Video Push,Email,Spot,Buzzer & Screen Tips
Internal Hard drive: 1 SATA Port,Up to 6TB 
Recording Modes: Manual/Motion/Schedule/Recycle (easily find and playback your security footage by searching a specific channel using date or time) 
Ethernet: RJ-45 Port 
USB Interface: 3 x USB2.0 
Maximum User Access: 10 Users 
Remote Operation(3G/4G/WiFi): Via http using IE & iPhone,iPad,Android & PC Client 
Power Supply: DC12V/2A
PTZ Control: 1 Port RS485 for PTZ control
Operating Environment: ﹣10℃~ +55℃,10%~90%RH


1080p Camera Main Features 
Image Sensor: 1/3"CMOS with IR-Cut 
Horizontal Resolution: 1920TVL(1080p) 
Lens: 3.6mm 
IR LEDs Amount: 36PCS 5mm LEDs
Max.IR LEDs Length: 120ft (36m) 
Angle of View:Horizontal: 90°
Body Construction: Metal
Ingress Protection: IP67 Weatherproof 
Day/Night Mode: Color during daytime/switches to B&W at night
Backlight Compensation: BLC/DWDR
Operating Environment: ﹣10℃~ +60℃,10%~90%RH


Package Contents 
1 x 8CH H.265+ DVR 
4 x 1080p Camera 
4 x 60FT BNC+DC CCTV cable for camera 
This is not Wireless Camera System, but we offer 60FT CABLE for each camera. 
2 x 12V/2000mA Power Supply 
1 x Mouse 
1 x 1 to 4 Power Splitter 
4 x Mounting Screw Bag 
1 x User Manual 
NO Hard drive included & Not support any external hard driveHDD Compatible with our DVR: Internal SATA 3.5" Consumer Electronics HDD
feature_bullets: (1). [ Advanced H.265+ High Efficiency Video Compression ] __ ZOSI self-developed H.265+ video coding technology extract features that focus on characteristics of the surveillance scenes for larger storage space and better image quality. H.265+ can further improve compression ratio on the basis of H.265 standard and save about 80% storage compared with H.264, and thus effectively saving storage resources and provides an excellent and smooth viewing experience.

(2). [ 2MP Extendable System Overview ] __ Exclusive 8 Channel full 1080p DVR Recorder paired with 4 Metal Weatherproof 1080p bullet cameras with 120ft night vision and 90°view angle(It allows you to add 4 more cameras). 60FT BNC+DC CCTV cabling provides both video and power to your cameras,more stable and reliable than wireless security system.(No Hard Drive Included)

(3). [ Local or Remote Access Anytime & Anywhere ] __ View and control your security system locally by connecting the system to a monitor, or via free ZOSI Client software on Windows or Mac, or via iOS & Android APP (ZOSI Smart ) on mobile devices remotely.

(4). [ Advance Motion Detection & Alert Push ] __ You can customize motion detection area in each camera to minimize false alerts. Instant notifications and email alerts will be pushed to your phone directly as long as the cameras detect moving objects.

(5). [ Customize Each Camera with Different Record Modes ] __Our ZOSI DVR offers 4 kinds recording modes to meet your needs: Record footage continuously; Record during scheduled times; Only record when detect motion; Recycle record. You can customize each camera with different recording modes, and download the recording files for the USB backup.
